manageAsset.title: Monitor Risks About
manageAsset.riskAboutAssetTypeDescription: Select the potential risks you want to monitor around your asset.
manageAsset.notificationsDescription: Set the notifications you want to receive when we detect warnings around your asset.
manageAsset.brandDescription: Detect potential crises around one of your brand.
manageAsset.keyPeopleDescription: Detect potential crises around one of your key people
manageAsset.brandAmbassadorDescription: Detect potential crises around one of your brand ambassadors
manageAsset.productDescription: Detect potential crises around one of your brand products
manageAsset.campaignDescription: Detect potential crises around one of your campaigns
manageAsset.industryDescription: Detect potential crises around one of your industries
manageAsset.customInfluencerDescription: Each author will trigger a warning when mentioning your asset in a social media post.
manageAsset.riskTermDesc: Each keyword will trigger a warning when associated with your asset in a social media post.
manageAsset.richEditorPlaceholder: Reuse import Listening sources, only Twitter, one source per line
manageAsset.helpCenter: To learn more, check our help center
manageAsset.addUpKeywords: You can add up to 100 keywords.
manageAsset.dailyDigestDescription: Receive a Daily Rundown by email about the risks around your asset. Learn More
manageAsset.realtimeNotificationsDescription: Receive a Notification whenever a new warning is detected around your asset. Learn More

warningCard.title: Warning Card
warningCard.severityDetail: AI-powered, estimated gravity of the crisis/warning.
warningCard.impactDetail: Impact on the overall brand volume of conversations.
warningCard.reachDetail: Estimate of how many users saw the content.
warningCard.digimindRisk: We immediately issue a warning as soon as we detect an unusually large influencer or a significant increase in volume of mentions. Our AI has been trained to accurately detect and identify the most critical types of risks.

riskTypesDescriptions.RISK_TERM: Will trigger a warning when our AI-powered algorithms detects a risk term in a conversation associated with this asset.
riskTypesDescriptions.CUSTOM_RISK_TERM: Will trigger a warning when we detect one of your custom term in a conversation associated with this asset.
riskTypesDescriptions.CUSTOM_INFLUENCER: Will trigger a warning when a custom author mentions this asset.
riskTypesDescriptions.BIG_INFLUENCER: Will trigger a warning when an unusually big influencer mentions for this asset.
riskTypesDescriptions.VOLUME_GROWTH: Will trigger a warning when we detect an usual volume of conversations around this asset.
riskTypesDescriptions.US_POLITICS: Will trigger warnings when an elected politician mentions one of my asset
